header_text: You were invited to join a picnic with several friends. As you pack, you can't seem to remember what to bring. You grab paper and a pencil and call your friends again, knowing they will give you a reminder.

elements.Text: When you struggle to remember, will your friends abandon you?

elements.name: You were invited to join a picnic with several friends. As you pack, you can't seem to remember what to bring. You grab paper and a pencil and call your friends again, knowing they will give you a reminder. _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
